scripts.db-export: wp search-replace http://localhost/barebones http://staging.codebluedigital.com/flexbones && wp db export $(pwd)/db-export.sql && wp search-replace http://staging.codebluedigital.com/flexbones http://localhost/barebones
scripts.generate-css: node-sass --output-style expanded assets/sass/style.scss style.css && pixrem -i style.css -o style.css -r 10px && postcss --use autoprefixer -o style.css style.css && cssnano style.css style.css --no-autoprefixer --no-convertValues
scripts.browserify: browserify assets/js/scripts.js -o scripts.min.js && uglifyjs scripts.min.js -o scripts.min.js
scripts.watch: livereload & npm run watch:sass & npm run watch:js
scripts.build: npm run db-export && imagemin assets/imgs assets/imgs && svg2png assets/imgs && npm run build:compile
